person.persName: John G. Burris (Nicholas county, Kentucky, merchant and postmaster.)

body.p: Nicholas county, Kentucky, merchant and postmaster. Fleming County, Kentucky, native. Married to Susan A. Finch Burris in Nicholas County, Kentucky, in February 1858. Father of Lillia Ann S. Burris, Everett M. Burris, and Earnest G. Burris. Merchant in Nicholas County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Nicholas County in 1860. Merchant and postmaster in Nicholas County in 1863.
